column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Marc Chagall's stained glass piece
column3: ' strikes me with awe every single time I view it.  I never tire of studying Picasso's 'Old Guitarist' (look closely enough
column4: and you can see where Picasso painted over an earlier composition to change the placement of the man's head).  Edward Hopper's 'Nighthawks' is one of my favorites.
